Reservation - Class in <Unnamed>
This Reservation Class represents each reservation made at the hotel this class contains the basic information on each individual reservation duration of stay, user and room

This constructor initializes all the data members of the class from the parameters thats been passes in
reserved(Date, Date, User) - Method in class Room
This method reserves the room for all the duration of the stay
reserved(Date) - Method in class Room

Room - Class in <Unnamed>
